===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# root of the [[false starwort]], {{taxlink|Pseudostellaria heterophylla|species|noshow=1}} (An [[adaptogenic]] herb used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to improve "[[yin]]" and "[[qi]]" energies, and to treat "dryness" of the lungs.)
